models.prompt:
The local aquarium is building a new tank to hold a large collection of tropical fish. The aquarium will be a glass tank in the shape of a rectangular prism that can be viewed from all sides, including the top and the bottom. The tank is 8 meters long, 9 meters wide and 5 meters high as shown in the net below.

A new billboard advertising the fish collection will say,"An amazing ___________ square meters of tropical fish viewing." What is the total surface area of the aquarium that should fill in the blank?
